description:
Map (shared/access_control/mapping_write.sol#11-30) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- map.length = key + 1 (shared/access_control/mapping_write.sol#17)

Map.owner (shared/access_control/mapping_write.sol#12) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- Map.withdraw() (shared/access_control/mapping_write.sol#26-29)
